title: The Dragon Quartet Omnibus, Volume 2
description: Here's an exciting fantasy tetralogy with all the right four elemental dragons (Earth, Air, Fire, and Water), each with a human companion. This series takes us from medieval Europe to the distant future, as the world is caught in a war between the forces of greed and fanaticism, and the dragons and their guides and allies who seek to restore the proper natural balance to the planet.
author: Marjorie B. Kellogg
